results.title: Metformin limits cerebral cavernous malformation development by targeting KLF4-mediated mitochondrial damage.
results.text_hl: However, the therapeutic benefits of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the realm of @<m>DISEASE_Hemangioma_Cavernous_Central_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020786 @@@CCM@@@ remain unclear.
